data.actual_result: Always the English strings are used.
data.expected_result: The delete message history options should be translated to the selected language.
data.short_description: Ban user: Delete message history options always with English strings
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Make sure you have the ban permission - Change your language to any Non-English language like German (must have approved strings) - Go to your server settings - Open the member list - Click on any user - Click on the ban option - Observe the delete message history options
